attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Save Our churches Muslims are buliding their Mosques so they can make this an Islamic state. I am British and I am proud of my culture. The goverment is trying to destroy everything which we hold dear to in this country. I won't stand for it and neither should any of
 you. So who's with me? Are You? Get signing. 

Blessed be the name of the Lord. Blessed be his glorious name.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
